newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Kent Electronics cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Kent Electronics cut.

text.p: -- Jefferies & Co Inc cut its rating on shares of Kent Electronics Corp to hold from accumulate due because of a recent run-up in the stock price.
-- "We believe the stock's current valuation fairly reflects earnings per share growth of 20 percent over the next three to five years," Jefferies said in a statement.
-- The investment brokerage has a 12-month price target of $30 a share on Kent stock. It was off 5/8 to 27-3/4 by midday Thursday.
-- As recently as April 23 shares of Kent, a value-added electronics distributor and contract manufacturer, closed at 22-1/4.
